import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import '../App.css' const CreateAccountForm = () =>{ interface inputData { email: string; password: string, repeatPassword: string } let data: inputData const checkAccount = (event: any) =>{ event.preventDefault() console.log('check account') console.log(event.target) data = { email: event.target.elements.email.value, password: event.target.elements.password.value, repeatPassword: event.target.elements.repeatPassword.value } console.log(data) } return(

Create an account

Email Password Repeat password
) } export default CreateAccountForm
